zh: 📄 1. 增加了网站的PDF解析功能，现在可以上传PDF了
👋 2. 再次欢迎大家使用ikunChat，有任何不顺手的地方请直接向站长反馈！😊
🔍 3. 请大家自行探索角色和设置的功能，如果感觉卡顿，请及时检查设置中的数据管理，对不需要的聊天记录进行删除
🚀 4. 稍后我们将上线更完善的数据管理系统！
en: 📄 1. Added PDF parsing functionality to the website, you can now upload PDFs
👋 2. Welcome again to ikunChat, please feel free to report any issues to the webmaster! 😊
🔍 3. Please explore the persona and settings features, if you experience lag, check data management in settings and delete unnecessary chat records
🚀 4. We will launch a more comprehensive data management system soon!

zh: Here we come, ikunChat for you!
🚀 性能优化：优化网站加载速度，减少不必要的资源消耗，提升整体用户体验。
🧹 模式精简：删除多余的主题模式，专注于核心功能，提供更简洁的选择。
🐔 图标更新：无奈丢弃了我们的鸽鸽图标。
🎨 UI/UX 彻底革新：引入 Material Design 3 (MD3) 设计语言并融合中国风美学，大幅简化聊天界面，为用户提供更纯粹、更专注的核心聊天体验。
⚙️ 配置项极致精简：响应极简主义原则，移除了大量不必要的设置选项，采用更智能的默认值，让用户开箱即用。
➗ 内容渲染优化：升级了 KaTeX 数学公式的渲染逻辑，确保复杂公式也能清晰、美观地展示。
💬 聊天视图简化：为了让内容成为绝对主角，移除了聊天流中的用户与助手头像及名称，使对话信息更突出。
➕ 输入功能整合：将图片与文件上传功能统一集成到输入框旁的+号按钮中，简化了操作流程，使输入区域更加整洁。
en: Here we come, ikunChat for you!
🚀 Performance Optimization: Improved website loading speed, reduced unnecessary resource consumption, and enhanced overall user experience.
🧹 Mode Simplification: Removed redundant theme modes, focusing on core functionality for a cleaner selection.
🐔 Icon Update: Replaced with brand new pigeon icon, enhancing brand recognition and visual appeal.
🎨 UI/UX Overhaul: Introduced Material Design 3 (MD3) with Chinese aesthetics, significantly simplifying the chat interface for a purer, more focused user experience.
⚙️ Settings Streamlined: Embracing minimalism, numerous unnecessary settings have been removed in favor of smarter, more robust defaults for an out-of-the-box experience.
➗ Content Rendering Optimized: Enhanced KaTeX rendering for clear and beautiful display of complex mathematical formulas, and redesigned the 'thought chain' presentation.
💬 Simplified Chat View: To prioritize content, user and assistant avatars/names have been removed from the chat flow, making the conversation more prominent.
➕ Unified Input: Image and file upload functionalities have been consolidated into the '+' button next to the input field, streamlining the user workflow.
